text:
I can't believe AI videos are this realistic.

How to try Veo-3 inside Gemini:

✦ Go to gemini(.)google(.)com.
✦ Click on "tool" & select "Videos with Veo".
✦ Prompt Veo-3 following this optimized template:

___

“Create a video that shows…”

Style: [video aesthetic]
Subject: a [character description]
Action: [what the subject is doing]
Scene: set in [location]
Audio: say the line [message here]
Audio cues: [voice/music] sounds like [description]

___

I am writing a complete guide on how to use Veo-3 for ads, articles, or social media content. It will go live on my newsletter "How to AI" at howtoai.guide.
